author: cnbc.com
title: GoPro Schedules First Quarter 2018 Financial Results for May 3, 2018
text:
SAN MATEO, Calif., April 12, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- GoPro, Inc. (NASDAQ: GPRO) today announced that it will release its financial results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2018, after the market closes on May 3, 2018.
GoPro management will host a conference call and live webcast for analysts and investors on May 3, 2018 at 2 p.m. Pacific Time (5 p.m. Eastern Time) to discuss the Company's financial results.
A live webcast of the conference call will be accessible on the "Events & Presentations" section of the Company's website at https://investor.gopro.com . The webcast will be recorded and the recording will be available on GoPro's website approximately two hours after the call and for 90 days thereafter. To listen to the live conference call, please dial toll free (877) 741-4253 or (719) 457-2604, access code 2677779, approximately 10 minutes prior to the start of the call.
About GoPro, Inc. (NASDAQ: GPRO)
GoPro helps the world celebrate and share itself in immersive and exciting ways.

For more information, visit www.gopro.com . GoPro users can submit their photos, raw clips and video edits to GoPro Awards for social stoke, GoPro gear and cash prizes.
